duties_responsibilities.duty: Evaluation, documentation and approval of supplier related changes and specifications discrepancies for materials provided by external suppliers
Intercompany material specifications alignment and consolidation
Resolution of Incoming Quality Control Issues
Work with vendors for discontinued or changed materials
Must work and interact effectively and professionally with and for others throughout various levels of the global organization
Must maintain company quality and quantity standards

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Mechanical, Electrical, Production, or Manufacturing Engineering
